case: Many different types of personal data are collected
quoteText:
At Toodledo, we collect a variety of information about our customers and visitors to the Toodledo websites and mobile applications in order to provide a better customer experience. This personal data falls into these categories:

Category of Data What It Includes Identity Data Your first name, last name, your login/password. Contact Data Your billing address and email address.

case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
quoteText: Identity Data IP address, your login data, operating system and browser type and version, location and other technology on the devices you use to access the website or mobile application.

case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
quoteText: To provide better content and service, Toodledo’s websites and mobile applications use the Cyfe analytics service and the Google Analytics web analytics service

case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
quoteText: Toodledo tracks your browsing habits across other third-party websites and we do not respond to browser do not track signals.

case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
quoteText:
Neither our website, mobile application nor our services are intended for children under the age of 16.
Toodledo does not target its services or this website or mobile application to children under 16.
Toodledo does not knowingly collect personal data from children under the age of 16.

case: Your personal data is used for advertising
quoteText:
We may also collect Tracking Data when you use our website or mobile application, or when you click on one of our advertisements (including those shown on third party websites).

Third parties or publicly available sources. We may receive personal data about you from various types of third parties, including:

  • Technical Data and/or Tracking Data from analytics providers, advertising networks and search information providers.

quoteText: If any court or arbitrator determines that the class action waiver set forth in this paragraph is void or unenforceable for any reason or that an arbitration can proceed on a class basis, then the arbitration provisions set forth above shall be deemed null and void in their entirety and the parties shall be deemed to have not agreed to arbitrate disputes.

You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

case: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
quoteText: The European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) allows for transfer of personal data from the European Union to a third country in certain situations.

case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
quoteText: Toodledo’s failure to enforce any of these Terms is not a waiver of such term.

case: 30 days of notice are given before closing your account
quoteText:
You may terminate these Terms at any time by ceasing use of the Service but You will not receive any refund of prepaid fees for the current subscription period, if applicable.
Toodledo additionally may terminate these Terms on thirty (30) days written notice to You if You breach any of these Terms and the breach remains uncured at the end of such thirty (30) day period.
